com.adobe.granite.auth.saml.util

Class SamlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.granite.auth.saml.util.SamlWriter

  • public class SamlWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    SamlWriter is responsible for writing saml data as xml. Uses default digest DEFAULT_DIGEST_METHOD and signature DEFAULT_SIGNATURE_METHOD algorithms, to sign SAML messages, unless reconfigured using the respective setter methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_DIGEST_METHOD 
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_SIGNATURE_METHOD

      • write

        public void write(Message message,
                  java.io.OutputStream out,
                  java.security.Key privateKey)
           throws SamlWriterException
        Marshals the given AuthnRequest as an xml document and writes it to the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        message - AuthnRequest to marshal.
        privateKey - The private Key of this SP to sign the authentication request (may be null)
        out - OutputStream to write the xml document to.
        Throws:
        SamlWriterException - An error occurred while marshaling the request.
